divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home baby sitter. I saw a deep red light in the sky. The object bounced around in random motions. It was flying around at an incredible speed, up and down without a any rhyme or reason. I just followed the object while I drove and didn't say anything until the babysitter said something. The object disappeared behind the tree line.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Shelby Township
There were no other sightings in Shelby Township on or around July 11th 2012
Summary: It appeared to be boomerang shape with lights changing from blue to red. It was bouncing around in the sky.
